PropertyFund is a real estate crowdfunding platform that connects investors to vetted development projects accross Africa. Browse through our projects, and be on your way to becoming a landlord. Yes, it is that easy!



Create a free Account

How it Works

You don't need much to become a landlord or a developer. Create an account in few minutes, find investments that fits your income and you are on your way to becoming a real estate investor. It is very easy

Create a Free Account

Register as a developer or an investor. Provide correct details so you can be verified

Find Projects

Browse through our vetted projects to see the one that fits into your investment plans. Select and invest or call for site inspection

Cash out

You can cash out by waiting for either rental income or sales of your unit of ownership to another person

About PropertyFund

PropertyFund is a real estate crowdfunding platform that seeks to revutionalize property ownership in Africa. We believe like stocks, units of property ownership should be able to be transfered from one person to another seamlessly.

What makes PropertyFund unique

Investment Alert

We send alert to you if we find properties we think you will like to invest on

Due deligence

We carry out due delignece on to make sure that every property liested here is safe for investments

Real time management

You get a complete and simple interfaced dashboard to manage your portfolio real time

Insurance

All your investments are insured, so no worries as you will never loose your investment

24/7 Customer support

You can reach to us anytime and our customer support team is ever ready to answer you.

Financial support

You can get cheap loans using your ownership units as a collateral. No story. No papper work

Are you a developer looking for money to start or finish your projects?

We understand all your needs to get investments into your developemts. That is why we are here. Create an account in few minutes, get your projects verified and listed and begin to see influx of investmens into your projects.
